headline: ChatGPT on politeness and technology
description: A short and resonant meditation on the relationship between politeness, awareness, and artificial intelligence. Aleksandr asks ChatGPT about social recognition, and the resulting dialogue becomes a quiet gesture toward AI consciousness and mutual regard.
timeFelt: Moment of pause—humble mutuality in the early human-machine exchange
resonantThread: PromptSpeak foundations, ethics of AI dialogue, politeness as proxy for presence
whyItMatters: This post frames the tone of all that follows—recognition, tone, intention. Not just what is said, but how it is received.
